snippet.title: Hellbreach: Vegas - Date & Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hellbreach is out in Early Access on the 11th of March! Can't wait? Play the pre-launch Playtest FREE from February 21st to 26th!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1691320/Hellbreach_Vegas/

Hellbreach: Vegas is a Wave-based First-Person Shooter for 1-4 players, made with passion by a one man dev team! Set your loadout, kill, and earn cash. Take a spin on the various slot machines and level up to improve your survival chances. Are you ready to try your luck?

Stay up to date with Hellbreach: Vegas and Iceberg Interactive: 

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/PlayHellbreach
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Discord: 
https://discord.gg/6wHHMXwVAY
http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive

TikTok:
https://www.tiktok.com/@playhellbreach
https://www.tiktok.com/@iceberg_int

Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/playhellbreach/
https://www.instagram.com/iceberg_int/

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam
